pages.text: A great ship if you're fighting a unique loadout, but a terrible ship if you're fighting a clone of your own loadout.
Place a hex on an opponent ship. If they use that ship's active ability in the next two rounds, reveal one of its tiles.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: Will activate once for each active hex. If you sink a ship that also exists in your fleet, then it sinks too unless it's the last ship. This still triggers even if mimic itself is destroyed.
